txt.en: The rat's body is contorted as if it died in pain, but there are no obvious signs of external damage. A green foam around its mouth seems suspicious. You should search for signs of what the rat may have ingested to cause its death.

You found a dead rat in the cellar of the tower. Some foam around the mouth indicates that it may have died of unnatural causes. You should search for whatever may have caused dead rats to appear in a tower occupied by healthy men.
This container has some herbs that could be used to create a poison
A glass on this shelf has a green foam in the bottom
There is nothing of interest in this container
None of these glasses stand out to you
Search for possible ingredients of the ingested substance
Whatever caused the rat to die can be found somewhere in the tower.\n\nYou should search for whatever the rat ingested that would have caused it to die.
Search for whatever contained the ingested substance
